General.Name: Beijing CTJ Information Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Beijing CTJ Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides information technology (IT) solutions to the government, financial and administrative institutions in China. The company offers financial integrated management solutions, financial treasury centralized payment electronic solutions, government financial management solutions, and financial non-tax electronic solutions, as well as government IT service solutions, such as data application solutions. It also provides electronic payment solutions, electronic voucher library systems, electronic seal systems, bank payments counter systems, and bank self- service counter systems, as well as electronic signature, digital envelopes, and other products; and financial budget management integrations. In addition, the company offers financial digital solution for budget units; customer service tracking, customer relationship management, and decision support analysis mechanisms; and operation and maintenance services. Beijing CTJ Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
